General.Name: Shenzhen Sunmoon Microelectronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Sunmoon Microelectronics Co., Ltd engages in the design, processing, and sale of integrated circuits in China. The company offers LED display driver chips, including display driver, grid screen driver, single/dual color drive, row driver chip, logic control chip, and numeric display driver chip; LED intelligent landscape driver chips, such as series driver, DMX512 parallel driver, and DMX512 serial driver chips; LED lighting driver chips incudes intelligent driver chips, high voltage linear driver chips, low voltage linear driver chips, and power supply driver chips; power management chips, including AC-DC driver, DC-DC driver, and LDO linear regulator; and mini LED backlight driver chips. Its products are used in MiniLED and MicroLED, such as LED display screens, smart landscapes, intelligent lighting, and electronics product and equipment. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
